thought: To craft gray_stained_glass_pane, I need to craft 8 glass_pane. Glass_pane can be crafted using glass, which can be smelted from red_sand. Therefore I will start by smelting the red_sand in slot 32 to the empty slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 32 to slot 11 with quantity 1
